name: 張素薰
objective: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
schedule:
4 e1 Syllabus, 2010, First Semester
Week	CNN ( No. 96)	Language Skills
1	Introduction	Introduction
2	Plane Spotting, E-Reader Revolution	Finding Faults
3	Deep running, Urban Green	Your Talk
4	The Ultimate Designer; A Partnership in Fashion	Self-examination
5	Eels that Heal, Goodall at 50	Impromptu Delivery
6	Eight-legged Oracle, Feeling the Heat	Outline Delivery
7	Mel’s Meltdown; Militant Monkeys	Manuscript Delivery
8	Group Playlet	Memorized Delivery
9	Mid-Term	Mid-Term
10	Small and mighty; Lehman Brothers	The Voice
11	Jargon buster; How safe is your smartphone?	The Voice
12	The end of the line; London on the cheap	Clarity
13	Tunnel to the past; Hijacked data	Self-Evaluation
14	A tooth for an eye; Plus-sized	Word Choice
15	Guiding light; Sand sketches	Word Meaning
16		
17	Powerpoint Presentation	
18	Final examination	Final examination
scorePolicy:
Assessment:
1.Weekly tests and Attendance (20 points maximum deduction). 80%
2.Oral reports and presentations. 20%
